titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to study and report to the Congress regarding recreational vessel operator training.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Coast Guard to study and submit a report to Congress on recreational vessel operator education and training, including a review of (1) Coast Guard Auxiliary and Power Squadron training programs, (2) existing state boating education programs, and (3) other hands-on training programs available to recreational vessel operators.
